My name is Benjy and I’m a user experience (UX) designer

I’m part of the digital team at Office for National Statistics (ONS).

I co-organise a design meet-up in Swansea. I have 3 kids, and when I’m not working, I like to spend time in The Great Outdoors or listening to music.

You might want to read my blog or find out a little more about me.
